panel__settings__global__subheader.message: Global settings for various interface elements.

panel__settings__global__theme_subheader.message: Select your theme, 'auto' infers theme from OS settings.

panel__settings__global__actions_subhead.message: Select the scope for the menu actions (clear, play, pause, ...).

panel__settings__global__interface_size_.message: Select the scaling of the interface (small, medium, large).

panel__settings__global__interface_pull_.message: Enabled/disabled pull to refresh in panels..

panel__settings__global__loading_subhead.message: Display a loading bar indicator while fetching data.

panel__settings__global__loading_thresho.message: Set the threshold (in ms) after which the loading bar is displayed for long query.

panel__settings__global__task__progress_.message: Display a progress bar indicator inside task cards.

panel__settings__global__task__backgroun.message: Display the progression of active download task in card background.

panel__settings__global__download__progr.message: Display a progress bar indicator inside download cards.

panel__settings__global__download__backg.message: Display the progression of active download in card background.

panel__settings__global__navbar__buttons.message: Shortcut buttons to display in the navbar.

panel__settings__global__panel_enabled_s.message: Open Side Panel instead of Popup when action button is pressed.
